name: stock_get_statistics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bb_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etcâ€¦ to create a financial site/application such as bloomberg.com
API description: Retrieve statistical information for a given stock.

is_id.description: The ID of the stock. Use the market/auto-complete API to get the correct values.

template.description: Specifies the type of statistical template to use. Options include 'COMMODITY', 'CURRENCY', 'INDEX', 'INDEXFUTURE', 'RATE', and 'STOCK'. Defaults to 'STOCK'.
